FuncDef:
The peer description command configures a description for a peer.
The undo peer description command deletes the description of a peer. The peer description command configures a description for a peer. The undo peer description command deletes the description of a peer. By default, no description is configured for a peer. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.
ParentView: BGP-VPN instance view,BGP multi-instance VPN instance session view

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IPv6 address of a peer.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

Specifies a description.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 characters. Letters, digits, and spaces are supported.

ExtraInfo: The peer description can be used to configure a description for a peer, which facilitates management of peers or peer groups. The description records information about the peer, such as the VPN instance to which the peer belongs, and devices that establish peer relationships with the peer.
